title: List of all Android video view  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android video view  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: FullscreenVideoView
repoList.description: An Android Library to replace VideoView with Fullscreen feature

repoList.name: AutoPlayVideoRecyclerView
repoList.description: Android library to auto play video from url in Recyclerview.

repoList.name: Android-Oembed-Video
repoList.description: A simple library for parsing and playing links from YouTube, YouTube Music, Vimeo and Rutube is WebView without the need to connect api data services. Request caching is available now

repoList.name: ExoVideoView
repoList.description: Alternative VideoView implementation that uses ExoPlayer for playback and may share the same instance of ExoPlayer between multiple views. Optimal for usage in lists or different fragments within the same activity.

repoList.name: CropVideoView
repoList.description: video library for android

repoList.name: Android-KCVideoView
repoList.description: An android library of powerful video view for android, with play,pause, volume ,full screen image buttons and functions.

repoList.name: CameraView-overlay-demos
repoList.description: Some demos built around the overlay feature (preview + picture + video record) of @natario1's CameraView (https://github.com/natario1/CameraView) Android library.

repoList.name: VideoViewLibrary
repoList.description: VideoView library for play video files in any android app

repoList.name: android-trimview
repoList.description: TrimView is a custom view library which is basically a double-sided ProgressBar view. It is best used as a visual controller to cut and trim audio and video files.

repoList.name: FitXYVideoView
repoList.description: Fit X Y Video View

repoList.description: An Android Library to replace VideoView with Fullscreen feature
